Between the rumbling Dinobots, Hoist strained to lift the debris he was
covered in during the crash off of him. As soon as he pulled himself out
he moved slowly and cautiously towards Sludge, like the way you aproach
a wild animal. "Now now, calm down." Hoist tried to say soothingly. He
aproached even closer, and tried to climb the Dinobot.
